sentences.en: "We don't want to name the man to spare his blushes," said a police spokesman.
sentences.cn: “为了不让当事人颜面扫地，我们就不指名道姓了，”一位警方发言人说道。

sentences.en: A London Underground spokesman defended the decision to hold the train until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 伦敦地铁公司的发言人为推迟发车直到警方赶来的决定作了辩解。

sentences.en: a spokesman for the victims’ families
A spokesman insisted the two events were "in no way related"
sentences.cn: 一位发言人坚称这两起事件“绝无关联”。

sentences.en: A spokesman said this firm action had defused a very nasty situation.
sentences.cn: 一位发言人称这一坚决的行动缓和了极为棘手的局面。

sentences.en: A spokesman said: "We have no comment regarding the publi-cation of these photographs."
sentences.cn: 一位发言人说，“对于这些照片的公之于众，我们不予置评。”

sentences.en: That spokesman is striking up the same old tune.
sentences.cn: 那个发言人又在老调重弹.

sentences.en: The spokesman made it clear that no compromise was yet in sight.
sentences.cn: 发言人表明,目前还不会妥协.

sentences.en: The spokesman made it evident that no compromise was yet in sight.
sentences.cn: 发言人表示,目前还不会妥协.

sentences.en: The spokesman refused to disclose details of the takeover to the press.
sentences.cn: 发言人拒绝向新闻界透露公司收购的详细情况。

sentences.en: The spokesman said no decision on the proposal was likely in the immediate future.
sentences.cn: 发言人说近期不会就这项提案作出决议。

sentences.en: The spokesman said the tone of the letter was very friendly.
sentences.cn: 发言人说信函的语气非常友好。

sentences.en: The spokesman slurred over the matter without giving a straight answer.
sentences.cn: 发言人对这件事不置可否,含糊其词.

sentences.en: The spokesman stressed that the measures did not amount to an overall ban.
sentences.cn: 该发言人强调这些措施并不等同于全面禁止.

sentences.en: They drew lots to decide who should be their spokesman.
sentences.cn: 他们抽签决定谁是他们的发言人.

sentences.en: This journalist distorted the spokesman's remarks.
sentences.cn: 这名记者曲解了该发言人的话。
